Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User(java.lang.String nameIn, java.lang.String in, java.lang.String out)
      Initialize the user object with values for everything but the password key that needs extra specific method and checks whether the password check reference file exists.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void generatePasswordKey(java.lang.String passwordInput)
      Takes a password input in the form of a string then runs the PBKDF2WithHmacSHA1 algorithm on it, formats it for AES

      • saltCheck

        public byte[] saltCheck()
                 throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Checks if there is a salt file for the user and if not creates one the saves it to a unique file
        Returns:
        returns the salt as a byte array if needed
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        java.io.IOException
